title: And Then Love Came Along...: A Second Chance At Love Romance
description: AND THEN LOVE CAME ALONG is a story about emotional turmoil after personal loss and mental abuse, about heartbreak and romantic fantasies and – ultimately – about overcoming the ghosts from the past and believing in a second chance at love.Rachel Turner is 33 years old and works as an English and Arts teacher for children with special needs at Fernvale Academy in Weymouth. She has been single for six years. Her previous relationship was toxic and mentally abusive and has left her insecure and with high walls of self-preservation built around her. Sam Allen is 37 years old and lost his wife and the love of his life to cancer six years ago. Both Rachel and Sam’s romantic backgrounds have left them heartbroken, and they are convinced that love is not in the cards for them anymore.When Sam starts working as a PE teacher and physiotherapist at the same school as Rachel, they find themselves inexplicably drawn to each other in a way that both excites and scares them at the same time. Sam saves Rachel from a dangerous situation, and then Rachel has an opportunity to do the same for Sam. But will this be enough for them to save each other from a past that was full of heartbreak and sorrow? And will they get a chance at a future that is filled with love and happiness?
author: Janine Campbell
